snippet: Ryan Braun, who avoided a suspension after a positive drug test, was 0 for 5 as the Milwaukee Brewers lost to St. Louis in their home opener.
abstract: MLB Roundup; St Louis Cardinals defeat Milwaukee Brewers, 11-5, in their home opener; Brewers outfielder Ryan Braun, who avoided a suspension after a positive drug test, was 0 for 5; other baseball scores noted.

byline.original: By JOE DIGIOVANNI and RICHARD SANDOMIR

lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun, who avoided a suspension after a positive drug test, was 0 for 5 as the Milwaukee Brewers lost to St. Louis in their home opener.

headline.seo: Brewers Lose to Cardinals Amid Cheers for Braun
headline.main: For Braun and the Brewers, a Warm Reception at Home, if Little Else
headline.print_headline: For Braun and the Brewers, a Warm Reception at Home, if Little Else
